subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Islanders finally gave up on goalie Rick DiPietro, who was sidelined by numerous injuries, placing him on waivers and ending a close relationship with the team owner Charles Wang.
snippet: The Islanders finally gave up on goalie Rick DiPietro, who was sidelined by numerous injuries, placing him on waivers and ending a close relationship with the team owner Charles Wang.
